ygData.subject: RE: I'm dying I think, that is bored (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Sounds like an arcade game. What happens if other groups are around and want to go into the dungeon? Are they supposed to wait for your group to completely
ygData.messageBody:
> required you or your group to venture further into
> a dungeon in order to find anything to fight. For
> example, you enter Befallen and fight your first
> fight. In this scenario, the spawn doesn't reappear
> until you move on further and fight the next spawn.

Sounds like an arcade game. What happens if other groups are around and
want to go into the dungeon? Are they supposed to wait for your group
to completely heal and finishing medding and move on before they get to
play? You think camping is bad now? Imagine 6 groups at the entrance to
a dungeon waiting for the parties before them to move on. Sounds like a
grocery store check out.

> The hard part would be determining
> the order groups got to enter into
> the dungeon.

Hard is not the word; impossible more like.

> There would have to be some form
> of cooperation

As soon as you find this in any large quantities in EverQuest, let me
know. I'd love to see it. Visit a Derv camp or Highpass Hold lately?
Cooperation is non-existant.

People have a finite amount of time to play EverQuest each day/week. I
for one wouldn't want to have to wait in line to visit a dungeon or any
other place that my group wanted to visit.
